name: Mole Mayhem
description:
Protect your sheep from waves of moles, don't let the moles touch your sheep! Shoot the crystals to prevent more enemies from spawning. 

Controls for HTC Vive:

  • Trigger to shoot
  • Hold Trigger to charge your shot
  • Trackpad for teleporting
  • Escape key to quit

All modeling/materials/animations/blueprints and levels were made during the UE4 Summer Game Jam.

Several particle effects were taken from the Infinity Blades Effects Demo.

Original soundtrack. Sound effects created with clips from from Soundly.

Character is a modified version of the VR Motion Controller Pawn.
